official_title: To establish a Small Business Manufacturing Extension Service, and for other purposes.
short_title: Small Business Manufacturing Extension Act of 1993

summary.text: Small Business Manufacturing Extension Act of 1993 - Requires the Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology to establish a Small Business Manufacturing Extension Service to coordinate and improve efforts to help small and medium-sized manufacturers to increase their competitiveness and efficiency through improved equipment, processes, and practices. Requires the Director to make grants for establishing extension offices to at least: (1) 50 applicants; or (2) one half of the bona fide applicants. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1994 through 1998.

titles.title: Small Business Manufacturing Extension Act of 1993
To establish a Small Business Manufacturing Extension Service, and for other purposes.
